description: This lexicon is in a not officially released state. It is subject to change. | Plays are submitted as a result of a user listening to a track. Plays should be submitted when a user has listened to a track for at least 30 seconds, or half of the track's duration up to 4 minutes, whichever is longest.

trackMbid.description: The Musicbrainz ID of the track

recordingMbid.description: The Musicbrainz recording ID of the track

duration.description: The length of the track in seconds

isrc.description: The ISRC code associated with the recording

originUrl.description: The URL associated with this track

musicServiceBaseDomain.description: The base domain of the music service. e.g. music.apple.com, tidal.com, spotify.com.

submissionClientAgent.description: A user-agent style string specifying the user agent. e.g. tealtracker/0.0.1b

isTracked.description: Whether or not this play is being tracked. If false, the play will not be shown past the length of the track, or 10 minutes, whichever is shorter. It is expected the App View or the user delete the play after this time.

playedTime.description: The unix timestamp of when the track was played
